entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Forestville

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.0°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
